channel.title: Project defined

item.title: Project defined
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_kyle pk3r kyle
item.description:
@pk3r_kyle wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Project Defined Development Team[/size]

NOTICE! I am being strict when hiring people. Please do not ask to become an Administrator or a Moderator, you will only ruin your chance of ever becoming one.

If you do not respond within 3 days of sining up, I will automaticly remove you.

What placement do you wish to have:
Why do you wish to sign up:
Are you reliable and up for the job:
Background experience (Atleast 5 sentences):

Names on the list have 4 stages. Each are color coded.
Blue: Just signed up. (Lasts for 1 day)
Red: Has not responded yet.
Green: Currently doing his/her job.
Yellow: Job status pending.

Server Coders:[/center]
1.
2.
3.
4.
5.

[center]Client Coders:[/center]
1.
2.
3.
4.
5.

[center]Web Development:[/center]
1.
2.
3.
4.
5.

[center]Testers:[/center]
1.
2.

After you sign up, please message me though PM or instant messaging. I am not always online on these. So please stand by if I do not respond. I do check this atleast 2 times a day.

MSN: kyle_eldridge123@hotmail.com

Sincerely, Pk3r Kyle

[size=30pt]The Client[/size] [size=30pt]is[/size] [size=30pt]80% complete[/size]
the client is 80% complete so…

it has so far:

//added some blue stat icons //added a new compas //removed the blue stat icons //added legendscape's stat icons (im owner of legendscape btw) //moddified legendscape's stat icons and made them look lush //added 377 cache //water moves //firecape moves //added head icons //added glios 3rd gen icons //added a graphiti text sayin "project defined" //transparent icons //added prayer above head //chains and ahrims look like it does on real rs //sprites are non leachable (means if you try takin them it stops your client from workin) //removed egui //added title buttons //added title box //added a crappy background //added a new inventory back //removed glios 3rd gen icons //the jagex icons for stats etc //removed inventory back (ruined the icons) //made new pk skulls to fit the client ☠ //added glios ancient icons // removed graphiti text sayin "project defined" (took up too much room) //added npc changer

[size=30pt]PictureS[/size]
